data.eml:eml: Two New Species Of The Genus Oedignatha Thorell (Araneae: Clubionidae) From Coastal Andhra Pradesh, India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Reddy, T. S., Patel, B. H. (1993): Two New Species Of The Genus Oedignatha Thorell (Araneae: Clubionidae) From Coastal Andhra Pradesh, India. Entomon 18 (1): 47-51, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.814901
